Package com.whitecanyongames.engine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Engine
    The base class for the engine The main game class extends from this class, any defaults put into this class in here will be included in the main game class if the method is used
    InputHandler2D
    Creates a basic input handler for handling key presses and releases
    ShaderLoader
    Allows the user to load a shader pair and compile them
    SplashScreen
    The splash screen class allows their to be a splash screen whenever the game starts Default display time: 5000 milliseconds
    TextureLoader
    This allows users to load texture files with a reusable TextureLoader object
    Utilities
    A utility class that provides wrappers for some openGL code
    WindowHandler
    This is a base window handler that removes the need for repeated code in the Engine, Editor, and Applet classes
